contextId.information: This is an exclamation, not a question. Jesus emphasizes the fact that people are much more valuable to God then birds. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclamations]])
contextId.quote: How much more valuable you are than the birds!

contextId.information: This is an exclamation, not a question. Jesus emphasizes that he will certainly take care of people even better than he does the grass. This could be stated clearly. AT: "he will certainly clothe you even better" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclamations]])
contextId.quote: how much more will he clothe you

contextId.information: This exclamation emphasizes how distressed he was. AT: "I am terribly distressed and will be so until I complete this baptism of suffering" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclamations]])
contextId.quote: how I am distressed until it is completed

contextId.information: This is an exclamation, and not a question. AT: "It is so very hard ... kingdom of God!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclamations]])
contextId.quote: How difficult it is ... kingdom of God!
